title: Zosia Mamet to star alongside Kaley Cuoco in thriller drama series The Flight Attendant
text:
Zosia Mamet has landed one of the main roles in the upcoming thriller drama series The Flight Attendant set to air on HBO Max.

The Girls alum will star alongside leading lady Kaley Cuoco, who will also serve as executive producer.

The upcoming eight episode series has been described as a terrifying story about how someone's life can dramatically be changed in one night.

On board: Zosia Mamet has signed-on to join the cast of the upcoming thriller-drama sewries The Flight Attendant that will air on HBO Max

Cuoco plays a flight attendant named Cassandra Bowden, who wakes up in her hotel room hungover with a dead body next to her and no idea what happened.

Afraid to call the police, she goes about her day as if nothing happened. Still unable to piece the night together, she slowly begins to wonder if she could be the killer.

Mamet will play Annie, a no-nonsense lawyer from New York who gets caught in the middle of the drama as she tries to help her best friend Cassie, according to Deadline.

Passion project: Former Big Bang Theory star Kaley Cuoco will play the lead in The Flight Attendant and serve as executive producer

The series is based on the novel of the same name by New York Times bestselling author Chris Bohjalian.

Along with Cuoco and Mamet, the cast also includes Sonoya Mizuno (Miranda), Michiel Huisman (Alex), Colin Woodell (Buckley) and Rosie Perez (Megan).

Mamet, 31, is best known for her role as Shoshana Shapiro in the hit HBO comedy-drama Girls (2012-2017).

Making her mark: Mamet is best known for her role as Shoshana Shapiro in the hit HBO comedy-drama Girls (2012-2017); she has appeared in United States Of Tara and Mad Men

She has also appeared in a number of television series including Parenthood United States Of Tara (2010), Mad Men (2010-2012) and the animated series Star Vs. The Forces Of Evil (2016-2019).

Most recently she had a recurring role in the Netflix mini-series Tales Of The City opposite Laura Linney and Ellen Page.

The Vermont native will also guest star on Apple's anticipated series Dickinson that stars Hailee Steinfeld as Emily Dickinson, which is slated to be released November 1.
description: Zosia Mamet has signed-on to star alongside Kaley Cuoco in the HBO Max thriller drama series The Flight Attendant.
